content.text:
# 9th Gaumee Film Awards

9th Gaumee Film Awards ceremony, honored the best Maldivian films released in 2017 and 2018. The ceremony was held on 15 November 2019.
Winners and nominees
Main awards
Nominees were announced on 8 November 2020.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%;"|Best Film
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%;"|Best Director
|-
| valign="top" |
*Vishka
**Ill Noise
**Hahdhu
**Dhevansoora
**Vakin Loabin

** Abdul Faththaah – Hahdhu

** Ali Shifau – Vakin Loabin
